citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10am on
06/16/2015. The licensee was contacted by phone and it was relayed that no one would be available to accompany
the inspector during the inspection process for the day.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10am on

the inspector during the inspection process for the day.
